text: was a Japanese cartoonist. His most famous work is Crayon Shin-chan. He liked to climb mountains. In 2009, when he climbed the Arafuneyama mountain in Gunma Prefecture, he slipped and died. He was 51 years old. == Selected works == *OL GUMI *Super Shufu Tsukimi-san *Crayon Shin-chan Category:1958 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Japanese artists Category:People from Shizuoka Prefecture
title: Yoshito Usui
